title: Rep. McCaul says Taliban blocking Americans on 6 planes from leaving Afghanistan
content:
1. Rep. McCaul says Taliban blocking Americans on 6 planes from leaving Afghanistan  Fox News
  2. GOP Rep. McCaul says 6 planes with Americans onboard are stuck at Afghanistan airport in 'hostage situation' with Taliban  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Taliban keeping Americans 'hostage' by not allowing flights to depart: Rep. McCaul  New York Post
  4. Top GOP lawmaker says Taliban won't let Americans leave from Afghanistan airport | TheHill  The Hill
  5. GOP Lawmaker Claims Taliban Currently Holding Americans 'Hostage for Demands'  The Daily Beast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: マッコール議員、タリバンが6機の飛行機に乗ったアメリカ人のアフガニスタン出国を阻止したと発表
麦考尔议员称塔利班阻挠美国人乘坐6架飞机离开阿富汗
麥考爾議員稱塔利班阻撓美國人乘坐6架飛機離開阿富汗
